title: Dcing due to internet, how fix?
body:
Hello, I do not know much about computers or internet and how exactly it works in relation to LoL, but for some odd reason my internet does not like me playing this game (sometimes). I will have normal ping and everything, but all of a sudden, my game will freeze, telling me I am trying to reconnect. A minute later, I will reconnect. As you can imagine, this is very, very, annoying. Try laning against a Yasuo when suddenly you give him a free kill by standing still for a couple of seconds before walking back to your fountain. This happens probably at least once everyother game, and some games it happens multiple times. 

If someone could fill me in on what is going  on and how to fix, I would appreciate it. I even asked our internet provider to bump up our internet, but that hasn't done anything. I live in Virginia and use Cox cable (sadly).

replies.body: Thanks for your detailed post on this.  It sounds like your connection to our game server is having trouble holding it together, and disconnecting you.  I recommend going over each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this fixed up for good.  Let me know if you have any questions!
